actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employment not in excess of 10 hours in any one day and not in excess of 4 days in any one week.

summary.text: Amends the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employment not in excess of ten hours per day and not in excess of four days per week by employees of contractors of the Federal Government whose contracts exceed $10,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employment not in excess of 10 hours in any one day and not in excess of 4 days in any one week.
